caption.title: The spatial pattern of H5N1 in Indonesia, China, and East-Southeast Asia.
caption.p: (a), (c), (e) show the distribution of observed H5N1 outbreaks; (b), (d), and (f) show the probability maps integrating the findings of the phylogenetic analysis ( Figures S2(a), (d), and (g)), the modified local K function analysis ( Figures S2(b), (e), and (h)), and the logistic regression analysis ( Figures S2(c), (f), and (i)). The closer the probability is to 1, the greater is the probability of an H5N1 outbreaks.
